00010   bool incCorner = 1; 
00011   unsigned int writeBOut = 0;

00015   ot::RegisterEvents();
00016 
00017   if(argc < 2) {
00018     std::cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " inpfile writeBOut[0]"<<
00019       " incCorner[1] "  << std::endl;
00020     return -1;
00021   }
00022   if(argc > 2) {
00023     writeBOut = atoi(argv[2]);
00024   }
00025   if(argc > 3) { incCorner = (bool)(atoi(argv[3]));}
00026

00028   strcpy(balOut,n2oOut);
00029   strcat(balOut,"_Bal.ot\0");

00032   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> linOct;
00033 
00034 
00035   ot::readNodesFromFile(n2oOut,nodes);
00036   unsigned int dim = nodes[0].getDim();
00037   unsigned int maxDepth = nodes[0].getMaxDepth();
00038 
00039   ot::TreeNode root(dim,maxDepth);
00040 
00041   ot::completeSubtree(root, nodes, linOct, dim, maxDepth, false, false);
00042 
00043   std::cout<<"Initial octree size: "<<linOct.size()<<std::endl;
00044 
00045   ot::ripple(linOct, incCorner);
00046 
00047   std::cout<<"Final octree size: "<<linOct.size()<<std::endl;
00048 
00049   if(writeBOut) { 
00050     ot::writeNodesToFile(balOut,linOct);
00051   }
00052 
00053   PetscFinalize();
